author: bencomic

right.text: "I think something in the water is giving me indigestion."

left.text: Yesterday my brita filter was out so i had to drink tap water, which tasted terrible. So i got to thinking, what if i was allergic to the water...

right.text: "Yeah, every time I take a drink from it, I feel a little worse. I think I should get bottled water."

left.text: "If you think that's best, by all means. If you'd like, you can send in a sample and I can go ahead and test it for any chemical allergens."

title: Doctor doctor, give me the news 1
